blocks.hero__content:
# Customize your page building experience to match your design system.

**Rockin' Blocks** now comes with [TinaCMS](https://tina.io), enabling teams to create fully-customizable page building experiences, while still leveraging the limitless power of React. Create blocks as simple as a card, or as complex as a checkout, then add it to your own drag-and-drop page builder.

blocks.cta__content: ## Manage your app, documentation, blog, components, and even all of your content in the same monorepo.
